div.p: M1669, unit 25, VPRS 1096 inward correspondence, VA 466 Governor, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of five new fascicles of Prof Miquels Annales,
Miquel (1863-9), probably the opening fascicles of vol. 4. descriptive of Indian plants,
M is here referring to plants from 'greater India', in this case the Dutch East Indies, now Indonesia. which work his Excellency has been pleased to transmit to this Department, and for which I tender my best thanks. This portion of the work has with the other parts, formerly received, been deposited in the Library of this establishment. I have the honor to be, Sir, your very obedient

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
